artifact.content: Name: Deactivate System ID: UC1 Event: Administrator brings IP Phone system offline System: Phone System Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when an administrator brings the IP Phone system offline. Preconditions: Server is started

Name: Initialize System ID: UC2 Event: Administrator turns on and initializes IP Phone system System: Phone System Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when an administrator brings IP Phone system online.

Name: Make a Call ID: UC3 Event: User calls another user System: Phone System Actors: Caller (initiator) and Callee Overview: Description of internal behavior when a user makes a call to another user in the system.

Name: Administrator Login ID: UC4 Event: Administrator logs into the system console System: System Console Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when an administrator logs into the system console.

Name: Administrator Logoff ID: UC5 Event: Administrator logs out of the system console System: System Console Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when an administrator logs out of the system console.

Name: User Account Administration ID: UC6 Event: Administrator modifies user account settings System: System Console Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when administrator attempts to modify user/ account information

Name: Calling Plan Management ID: UC7 Event: Administrator modifies calling plan settings applicable to all users System: System Console Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when administrator accesses universal billing plan configuration

Name: System Configuration ID: UC8 Event: Administrator modifies system settings System: System Console Actors: Administrator (Initiator) Overview: Description of internal behavior when administrator accesses system configuration
